channel.title: US Treasury Yield After Moody's Downgrade
channel.description: Will Moody's downgrade trigger US Treasury yield above 5% by Q2 2026?

item.title: Will Moody's downgrade trigger US Treasury yield above 5% by Q2 2026?
item.description: Moody's downgraded U.S. credit rating to Aa1 on May 16, 2025, citing debt concerns. This followed S&P's 2011 downgrade. Market resolves YES if 10-year Treasury yield exceeds 5.0% for 5+ consecutive trading days by June 30, 2026.

resolution.rules: Market resolves YES if the 10-year U.S. Treasury yield closes above 5.00% for five or more consecutive trading days at any point between December 11, 2025 and June 30, 2026. Resolution uses official U.S. Department of Treasury daily yield curve data.
